information.name: gcash-payment
information.description: Accept GCash payments via QR code with payment verification and auto-posting to client accounts
information.author: xingginto

configuration.label: GCash Account #1 - QR Code URL
configuration.description: URL to QR code image for Account #1

configuration.label: GCash Account #1 - Active Days
configuration.description: Days when Account #1 is active (e.g., 1-10 or 1,2,3,15). Leave empty to always use this account.

configuration.label: GCash Account #2 - QR Code URL
configuration.description: URL to QR code image for Account #2

configuration.label: GCash Account #3 - QR Code URL
configuration.description: URL to QR code image for Account #3

configuration.label: UISP Payment Method
configuration.description: Payment method name or UUID (e.g., GCASH-Plugin or a UUID)

configuration.label: Auto-approve payments
configuration.description: Set to 1 to auto-approve payments (not recommended), 0 for manual approval

configuration.label: reCAPTCHA v3 Site Key
configuration.description: Google reCAPTCHA v3 site key (get from google.com/recaptcha)
